scripts.dbbackup: docker exec -it database bash -c 'pg_dump -U directus -W -F t directus > ./backup/database_dump.pg'
scripts.start: npm run ascii && cd database && docker-compose up -d && cd ../cms && docker-compose up -d && cd ../ && npm run frontend && echo "$(tput setaf 3)Use $(tput setaf 1)npm run dbrestore $(tput setaf 3)to restore the database. " && echo "Use $(tput setaf 1)npm run restart$(tput setaf 3) to restart after the restore." && echo "" && echo "$(tput sgr0)Database started successfully. Located at http://localhost:5432" && echo "CMS started successfully. Located at http://localhost:8055" && echo "Frontend started successfully. Located at http://localhost:8080"
scripts.stop: npm run ascii && cd cms && docker-compose down && cd ../database && docker-compose down && npx kill-port 8080 && echo "Datbase, CMS, and Frontend stopped successfully."
scripts.restart: npm run stop && npm run start
scripts.clean: cd database && docker-compose down --rmi all --volumes --remove-orphans && docker-compose up -d && cd ../cms docker-compose down --rmi all --volumes --remove-orphans && docker-compose up -d
scripts.dbrestore:default: docker exec -it database bash -c 'pg_restore -U directus --clean --no-owner --no-acl --dbname=directus ./backup/dev_database_backup.pg' || echo $?
scripts.dbrestore:windows: winpty docker exec -it database bash -c 'pg_restore -U directus --clean --no-owner --no-acl --dbname=directus ./backup/dev_database_backup.pg' || echo $?
scripts.frontend:default: cd frontend && nohup npm run serve > /dev/null 2>&1 &
scripts.clear: npm run ascii && cd database && docker-compose down --rmi all --volumes --remove-orphans && cd ../cms && docker-compose down --rmi all --volumes --remove-orphans && npx kill-port 8080 && echo "Database and CMS cleared successfully."
scripts.init: npm run ascii && cd database && docker-compose up -d && cd ../cms && docker-compose up -d && cd ../ && npm run dbrestore && npm run frontend && echo "$(tput setaf 3)Use $(tput setaf 1)npm run dbrestore $(tput setaf 3)to restore the database. " && echo "Use $(tput setaf 1)npm run restart$(tput setaf 3) to restart after the restore." && echo "" && echo "$(tput sgr0)Database started successfully. Located at http://localhost:5432" && echo "CMS started successfully. Located at http://localhost:8055" && echo "Frontend started successfully. Located at http://localhost:8080"
